main_definition: To achieve a successful outcome or gain points, typically in the context of sports or games.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Achieve success or victory in a competition or game.
meanings_and_examples.example: The basketball team scored a winning point at the last second.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Record points obtained during a performance or activity, often used metaphorically to indicate impressive results.
meanings_and_examples.example: His presentation was so well-received that it really scored high in terms of feedback.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To mark or make visible (as on a scoreboard) the points accumulated by participants in an event.
meanings_and_examples.example: The referee scored the penalty kick, adding three points to the team's total.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To attain a particular goal, often with significant effort or achievement.
meanings_and_examples.example: She managed to score her dream job after several interviews and hard work.
